subtitle: A very easy dessert that can be prepared ahead when entertaining. Serve with creme fraiche or custard.

method.text: Roll out pastry. Cut out 13 cm circles (one per serving). Place the pastry rounds onto a dampened baking tray. Prick all over with a fork.
Arrange the fruit on top of the pastry rounds, fanning the fruit out. Dredge with a little icing sugar. Dot evenly with the butter.
Bake in the oven for about 10 min or until well risen and golden brown. Dredge liberally with any remaining icing sugar.

title: Apple tartlets
